snippet: In announcing new police powers, Prime Minister David Cameron was trying to show toughness in the face of young British Muslims’ going off to fight in Syria and Iraq,
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron proposes legislation that will give police power to seize passports of Britons suspected of having traveled abroad to fight with militant groups; measure is meant to show toughness in face of young British Muslims' going off to fight in Syria and Iraq.
lead_paragraph: In announcing new police powers, Prime Minister David Cameron was trying to show toughness in the face of young British Muslims’ going off to fight in Syria and Iraq,

headline.main: British Leader’s Plan Targets Jihadists’ Passports
headline.print_headline: British Leader’s Plan Targets Jihadists’ Passports

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
